channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Aparna Gopakumar
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Aparna Gopakumar

item.title: Quora question pair similarity
item.description: Machine learning task: Natural language processing, Binary classification Libraries used: Pandas, Numpy, Seaborn, Sklearn, plotly, Regex, NLTK, Beautiful soup, Porter stemmer, fuzzy-wuzzy Performed exploratory data analysis using Python seaborn and numpy libraries Performed feature engineering and extracted non NLP features from the text description of the question. Converted the text features into NLP features such as TF-IDF and Word2Vec. Built Logistic regression model with log loss<0.8 Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Social network graph prediction link challenge
item.description: Machine learning task: Supervised binary classification Libraries used: Pandas, Numpy, Seaborn, Sklearn, networkx The dataset was provided by Facebook as a data challenge. The data was in the form of directed graph. Developed algorithms to extract 15 graph based features. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Microsoft malware detection
item.description: Machine learning task: Supervised learning : Multiclass classification Libraries used: Pandas, Numpy, Sklearn, Seaborn, Matplotlib, XGBClassifier, Multiprocessing, codecs, pickle, NLTK Vectorized hexadecimal byte file features. (Unigrams) Performed multivariate analysis to determine the quality of features in machine learning model. After extensive research on Malwares, extracted top keywords from ASM files. Optimized the operation by making use of Parallel processing in Python Employed dimensionality reduction technique T-SNE to visualize the classification result of the model Built classification based models KNN, XGBoost, Logistic regression and Random forest classifier.

item.title: Personalized cancer diagnosis
item.description: Machine learning task: Text Mining using NLP techniques Libraries used: Pandas, Numpy, Sklearn, Seaborn, NLTK, Matplotlib Performed data cleaning on research text including lemmatization and word stop removal Performed Univariate analysis on each feature to identify the effect of each feature on the model Performed data wrangling- developed response coding algorithm to convert the text feature into usable quantitative feature. Performed hyperparameter tuning to improve the KPI of the model.
